data.title: Chinese Language Program
data.text:
The Chinese Language Program serves to help students to improve Chinese language skills and to acquire a better understanding of China. Curriculum is designed under the unit of one semester. Each semester consists of approximately 18 weeks.

Students will receive completion certificate and transcript if meet the requirement of enrollment, examination and attendance when they finish study. Qualified students may also apply to extend the program if to be approved.

Click here for more information about the program, FAQ, and on-line application website.
